mapper.select: SELECT t.user_id, t.arrival, t.departure, COALESCE(sv.view_count, 0) AS view_count FROM traffic t LEFT JOIN station_views sv ON t.traffic_id = sv.traffic_id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY sv.view_count DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO traffic (traffic_id , arrival, departure, arrival, viewCount) VALUES (#{trafficId}, #{userId}, #{departure}, #{arrival}, #{viewCount})
